name: 賴炎生
objective:
Co-simulation will be introduced to use circuit-based and control-based software to help the students to understand and confirm 
　　the techniques required for the development of inverter, including modeling, simulation, PWM control, vector control, direct torque control, multilevel inverter control by simulation
　　some problems and the related solutions for inverter
To achieve processor in the loop and software in the loop for inverter control as the DSP-based control board is available, hopefully.
schedule:
單元主題 / Topic:
1.　　Circuit-based and Control-based 軟體的介紹
2.　　Six-pulse 整流器模擬
3.　　Twelve-pulse 整流器模擬
4.　　二階變頻器模擬
5.　　三階變頻器模擬
6.　　多階變頻器模擬
7.　　座標轉換與交流電機模擬
8.　　交流電機向量控制模擬
9.　　脈波寬度調變模擬
10.　　交流電機向量控制與二階變頻器 Co-Simulation
11.　　具有脈波寬度調變的交流電機向量控制與二階變頻器 Co-Simulation
12.　　具有脈波寬度調變的交流電機向量控制與三階變頻器 Co-Simulation 
13.　　交流電機直接轉矩控制
14.　　交流電機直接轉矩控制與二階變頻器 Co-Simulation
